member.name: M:SeeSharp.PreviewRender.Program.Main(System.IO.FileInfo,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: Path to the .json scene file to render
Number of samples per pixel to render
Width of the rendered image in pixels
Height of the rendered image in pixels
Set to false to write a multi-layer file with AOVs
Whether to run Open Image Denoise on the flattened output image
If true, the image is displayed and continuously updated in the tev viewer.
